DataSource.Query: WITH summary AS ( SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, units.unit_id as base_unit_id, SUM(order_details.quantity) as base_total_quantity, units.unit_code FROM sales.orders JOIN sales.order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN inventory.items ON order_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON order_details.unit_id = units.unit_id WHERE orders.office_id = @OfficeId and orders.cancelled = false AND orders.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date group by items.item_name, units.unit_code,items.item_id, units.unit_id) SELECT row_number() over(order by item_name) as "Serial No", inventory.get_item_name_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_name, inventory.get_item_code_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_code, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(inventory.get_root_unit_id(base_unit_id)) AS unit, sum(inventory.convert_unit(base_unit_id, inventory.get_root_unit_id(base_unit_id)) * base_total_quantity) AS quantity FROM summary group by item_id, item_code, item_name ,unit ORDER BY item_name;
